website_summaries.verdict: Practicing with this bag helps you build muscle memory for good swings. Using it can help eliminate fat and thin shots, as well as wrist flipping problems.
pros: Helps you master the correct feeling when swinging the club and hitting the ball
Gives you indoor practice when the range isn't accessible
you fill with linens, newspapers or other material
cons: Seams can rip, so be sure you practice controlled strokes rather than swinging as hard as possible

customer_reviews.title: Shotgun!
customer_reviews.text: I filled it with old clothes as instructed. But when I strike the bag even with a half swing it sounds like a shotgun. There’s no practicing in the house while everyone sleeps. And the law could be called when I hit it outside.
customer_reviews.author: phillip88

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Good value and quality. I filled it with old clothes and it works great. If you hit it as hard as you can, I suppose you would damage it, but that is not what it is for.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: My instructor told me to get one of these... 15 minutes a day... has really helped my game. Facilitates balance and control. Worth the cash.
customer_reviews.author: Test Equipment Vendor

customer_reviews.title: Golf Impact Power Smash Bag
customer_reviews.text: I love it, I use it often and is strong. Helps my muscle memory for chips and pitches. I was concerned because I read it tore easy but then maybe it was being hit too hard.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Add two bags of polyprolene filler from Walmart. $3.50 per bag. And it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Neb Tiffam

customer_reviews.title: Useful and well constructed
customer_reviews.text: Excellent training tool for understanding impact position in a golf swing
customer_reviews.author: Rather Golf

customer_reviews.title: Works like it should.
customer_reviews.text: It's a hitting bag. I filled it with towels and went to work. No problems so far.
customer_reviews.author: BrianH

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works well as a golf trainer . Stuffed it with old clothes and it holds up well
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Collins

customer_reviews.title: Ripping at the seam
customer_reviews.text: I have only hit the bag about 20 times and it’s already ripping at the seam. So disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Tswog

customer_reviews.title: ... this I wasn't sure about it but after use great tool for
customer_reviews.text: When I bought this I wasn't sure about it but after use great tool for golfers
customer_reviews.author: TSMOOTH2

customer_reviews.title: Bag works as expected; except that the zipper is ...
customer_reviews.text: Bag works as expected; except that the zipper is cheap. I chose to duct tape it instead of returning the bag as the zipper would likely break again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Definitely helps your ball striking but it makes a lot of noise if you have neighbors.
customer_reviews.author: LegalBeagle

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk. Seam split open within several strikes ...
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk. Seam split open within several strikes and no returns accepted.
customer_reviews.author: Peter G. Robbins

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Just the outer shell. Nothing included to actually fill the bag. Meaning that you need to find it on your own and pack it yourself using whatever spare towels, rags, old clothes you have. Particularly frustrating when you just recently went through all your closets and donated any old clothes.
customer_reviews.author: D. W.

customer_reviews.title: wears out quickly
customer_reviews.text: i only used this about once every 2 weeks - hitting it maybe a dozen times when doing something else in my basement. within 8 months it developed tiny cracks that permitted the stuffing to come out. Moreover, the zipper doesn't stay closed, and even though i tried tying it closed with string, a small opening would develop permitting stuffing to come out. i would recommend a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: William W. Baker

customer_reviews.title: the handle ripped
customer_reviews.text: its good quality, the sand wont come out, but the handle ripped off the first time i tried to pick it up only half full of sand. As a used version, mine looked completely new from the package.
customer_reviews.author: Kim. NYC Teacher & pet mom

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality
customer_reviews.text: I know these don’t last long but today I filled it with old bed sheets and after hitting it about 15 times the seems started to come off. Not really happy about that. I’ll keep using it til it falls apart completely.
customer_reviews.author: David J Juhn

customer_reviews.title: Won't Buy Again
customer_reviews.text: Bought 1 of these a few months ago, liked it so much I bought another for the office to use on lunches. After only using it for a few weeks, it is ripping apart at a seam. Should be MUCH more durable than this, not too happy.
customer_reviews.author: michael gowdy

customer_reviews.title: Decent Golf Tool
customer_reviews.text: This impact bags is cool, maybe I need to stuff more clothes in it or something, because upon impact, the bag tips over for me almost every time I hit. I expected to bag to slide left, right, or straight but this bag does not slide for me at the moment. The impact bag does make a nice thudding sound when impacted and is useful in helping to improve your impact position after the ball is hit.
customer_reviews.author: GeeDee77

customer_reviews.title: Handle strap separated from bag
customer_reviews.text: Five minutes after unpacking the handle strap on one side completely separated from the bag when I attempt to lift it after packing it with towels. I ordered a replacement bag because it had good reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Davis

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: The product is performing as described. The material is very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

product_meta.title: Amazingli Golf Impact Power Smash Bag Hitting Bag Swing Training Aids Waterproof Durable
product_meta.description:
Product Specifications:

* Color: Black/Yellow

* Weight: 0.45kg

* Size: Diameter: 44cm, Height: 26cm

* Material: Composite material(Nylon) and waterproof

* Helps eliminate fat and thin shots and cure slices, easy-to-interpret target.

* Heavy-duty, high-impact material fills with old towels or clothes.

* Perfect safe for you and your club, ideal in combination with other trainers.

* Hitting into the Smash Bag helps eliminate fat and thin shots, cure slices.


Notice: 

* Filling cloth, old clothes and other soft items inside are highly recommended.

* Do not fill sand, mud, gravel and other hard objects.

* Do not use brute force when exercise to avoid damage golf power smash bag or muscle strain.


Package Includes:

1 pcs
feature_bullets: Scientific design according to the basic principles of golf swing, to help players master the correct feeling on swinging ball
It is recommended to fill cloth, old clothes and other soft items in the golf impact bag.Do not fill in hard objects such as sand, dirt, and stones.
Can effectively help players find a more solid feeling of swing ball with the product by practice
Help the players hit the ball more decisive and effective, Designed for correct golfers to practice hitting a ball, safe and reliable
Can quickly corrected the right hook, so players can master the shot correctly
